SEARCH
Package com.GraphicalPasswordAuth.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.GraphicalPasswordAuth.services.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class for handling core business logic related to user management, including registration, login, password reset, and icon-based authentication.

    decryptEncryptedIconCodes(String encryptedBase64)

      public UserService()

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public User registerUser(User user)
      Registers a new user by verifying the encrypted icon grid, hashing the icon-based password with a salt, and storing it in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object received from frontend
      Returns:
      the saved User entity

    • loginUser

      public boolean loginUser(String email, String iconPasswordInput)
      Validates login credentials by comparing the hashed icon password.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      iconPasswordInput - the icon-based password input from the user
      Returns:
      true if credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • generatePasswordResetToken

      public void generatePasswordResetToken(String email)
      Generates a secure reset token and sends a password reset email to the user.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address

    • resetPassword

      public boolean resetPassword(String token, String newIconPassword) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Resets the user's password using the provided token and new icon-based password.
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token
      newIconPassword - the new icon-based password
      Returns:
      true if reset is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if hashing fails

    • getEncryptedIconsByEmail

      public Optional<String> getEncryptedIconsByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves the encrypted icon set for the specified user's email.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      Returns:
      Optional containing encrypted icon string or empty if not found

    • decryptEncryptedIconCodes

      public String decryptEncryptedIconCodes(String encryptedBase64) throws Exception
      Decrypts the encrypted icon code string using AES-GCM.
      Parameters:
      encryptedBase64 - the base64-encoded encrypted string
      Returns:
      decrypted plain string
      Throws:
      Exception - if decryption fails
